snippet: An interactive graphic shows the political evolution of each state from 1952 through 2008 and the states’ current standing in the FiveThirtyEight forecast.
abstract: An interactive graphic shows the political evolution of each state from 1952 through 2008 and the states’ current standing in the FiveThirtyEight forecast.
lead_paragraph: We’ve been tracking the political evolution of each state in our Presidential Geography series. But to get the whole picture at once — how each state has shifted from presidential election to presidential election — check out this amazing interactive graphic from our colleagues Mike Bostock and Shan Carter. It follows the electoral path of each state from 1952 through 2008 and shows the states’ current standing in the FiveThirtyEight forecast.

headline.main: Over the Decades, How States Have Shifted
